Name: INTO THE NIGHT
Size: APPROX 55 sq ft *Photo table is 5 ft wide
Notes: Into The Night is a very soft and lush nubuck leather. Nubuck is a top grain leather that has a slight nap that looks and feels like suede but is considerably stronger. Natural markings such as brands, bug bites, and scratches are to be anticipated and only enhance the natural beauty of the hide, creating a unique and rustic aesthetic. We are proud to offer this beautiful premium full-grain leather at a price anyone can afford. Approx Weight 2.6 - 3.0 oz / sq ft Approx Thickness 1.0 - 1.2 mm
Important Note: Because our cowhides are premium top grain leather, natural markings such as brands, finished scratches / bites, and hump holes (a narrow slit along the spine) may OR may not be present. Typically, these markings are very subtle and are considered by most as the "signature" of fine leather. See our  leather yield  and  natural markings  pages to learn more about what you should expect when buying a leather hide.

Name: STORMY MONDAY
Size: APPROX 55 sq ft *Photo table is 5 ft wide
Feel: VERY SOFT WITH LIGHT WAXY FEEL
Notes: Stormy Monday is a  full aniline-dyed leather that has a deep, rich patina (color). Because aniline dyes are absorbed differently across the hide, the color has "depth" as slight variations in tones create a stunning vintage look. As part of the tanning process Stormy Monday is infused with a blend of oil and waxes giving it the prized, yet subtle, pull-up effect. The "pull up" is a soft burst of lighter tones that results from the leather being pulled or stretched during upholstering. Stormy Monday may have very slight color variations within the hide and from hide to hide as is common with premium aniline-dyed leather. Please note that some subtle natural markings such as brands, healed scratches and scars will be present and are considered the signature of fine leather. Get this premium full grain leather at a price anyone can afford. Order a sample before these hides are gone.  Approx Weight 2.6 oz/sq ft. Approx Thickness 1.0-1.2 mm.

Yet, Porter is a full "recovery" leather so simply rubbing Porter by hand returns it to its original rich dark condition! Also, as an oiled tanned leather, Porter is resistant to water and other elements. Porter is an exceptional leather that only gets more beautiful with time. Ideal for upholstery, bags, cases, covers and general leathercraft. Approx Weight 2.6 oz/sq ft. Approx Thickness 1.0 mm

Notes: A premium waxed leather produced from US steer! This is a full aniline leather with a truly authentic look. Each hide says "100% genuine leather the way leather used to be!" No bells or whistles - made only with pure oils, waxes and dyes to create a richly toned, timeless leather. This leathers patina is further enhanced with a soft pull up effect when stretched or pulled for upholstery. It is also tough - scratch the leather and simply rub the scratches out. A full-bodied weight combined with an extra supple feel make this piece ideal for upholstery and leather goods of all types. Made for those who truly love leather! Approx Weight 3.5 oz/sq ft. Approx Thickness 1.3-1.5 mm
Important Note: Because our cowhides are premium top grain leather, natural markings such as brands, finished scratches / bites, and hump holes (a narrow slit along the spine) may OR may not be present. Typically, these markings are very subtle and are considered by most as the "signature" of fine leather. See our  leather yield  and  natural markings  pages to learn more about what you should expect when buying a leather hide.

Notes: Made in Italy, New London is a bold, sumptuous pull-up leather. Finished with full aniline dyes on European hides, New London is a signature leather for individuals that prize the beauty and rich character of strong pull-up leather. New London's waxy finish is intended to distress and "burst with lighter tones" but the original coloring can be returned by working the leather by hand with a quality leather conditioner. With use, the patina of the New London will only improve developing a rich, timeless look. Some subtle natural markings may be present with most blending seamlessly into the bold character of the leather. Subtle variations in tone within the hide and hide to hide are to be expected. Name: WY#3 COPPER MINE
Size: APPROX. 26 sq ft *This is a Half Hide
Notes: A premium waxed leather produced from US steer! Wyoming Copper Mine is a full aniline leather with a truly authentic look. Each hide says "100% genuine leather the way leather used to be!" Wyoming has no bells or whistles - made only with pure oils, waxes and dyes to create a richly toned, timeless leather. Wyoming's patina is further enhanced with a soft pull up effect when stretched or pulled for upholstery. Wyoming is also tough - scratch the leather and simply rub the scratches out. A full bodied weight combined with an extra supple feel make Wyoming ideal for upholstery and leather goods of all types. Wyoming is made for those who truly love leather! Approx Weight 3.5 oz/sq ft. Approx Thickness 1.3-1.5 mm

Name: OLYMPIA
Size: APPROX. 31 sq ft *This is a half hide
Notes: Made in Italy, Olypmia is a gorgeous multi tone leather finished with a prized sauvage technique. This technique blends warm tones into a rich color palette comparable to traditional hand finished leather. The grain for Olympia is a naturally occurring mill pebble that has subtle variations across the hide as nature intended. Olympia is a slight heavyweight leather with a full bodied feel that is exceptionally soft and plush. All leathers in the Naturals Collection are treated with a transparent top coat making them stain and wear resistant. LHS is proud to offer premium Italian leather at wholesale prices! Approx weight of hide: 3.5 oz/sq.ft. Approx thickness: 1.3-1.4 mm

Approx thickness: 1.3-1.4 mm
Important Note: Because our cowhides are premium top grain leather, natural markings such as brands, finished scratches / bites, and hump holes (a narrow slit along the spine) may OR may not be present.
